title: Coronavirus: Slovakia to test Roma community
description: The government says around 1,500 members of the Roma community have recently returned from abroad.
content:
Image copyrightGettyImage caption
 Roma communities in Slovakia face high levels of deprivation
Slovakia is to begin testing members of the Roma community for coronavirus on Friday. 
The government announced the measures on Monday, saying that around 1,500… [+1197 chars]
